MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Kimberley Street  and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:11am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a fault on our underground cable network affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:14am on the 14th of April 2021
